reviews.review:
Me lo he pasado recientemente, y he aquí mi crítica personal:
- Objetivamente es un buen juego: innova en muchas cosas, mejora otras, etc.
- Subjetivamente no me ha gustado: se me ha hecho largo, pesado y dificil porque no me gustan los puzzles. A mi parecer, es mejor el juego original que esta 2ª parte.
No puedo recomendarlo porque no me ha gustado, pero si te van las puzzles, adelante, cómpralo.

i played it with my friend. we made wrong portals. we blocked. we went to the hub. we started again.
10/10 would play again :)
This game took me for about 2 and a half hours. Just waiting for Portal and Half-life 3
Good
Valve fixed the bug on Portal 2, so that now Mac OS X users can play it.

the certain game, it's my duty to write a complete review about any game i finish, so here is my review:

PORTAL 2:

This is the second part of the "Portal" series. Unlike many series, Portal 2 is many times better than Portal, which is pretty awesome. It is the best puzzle game ever made, according to most people on the internet, and anyone who has played it can't dissagree with taht opinion. Even the negative reviews say things like "Why are you looking at the negative reviews on the best game on steam?".

In Portal 2 we see the return of Chel, the character from Portal, who teams-up with Wheatley, a second AI robot, apart from GLaDOS, in order to help him take down GLaDOS.
The story is set after the events of Portal and also after the events of Half-Life 2, with many elements from Portal (1 and 2) to appear in Half-Life (1 and 2). 

Summarizing, this is yet another masterpiece from Valve, the best puzzle game ever made and the second best game ever made, following Half Life 2.
It is an amazing experience and i recomend it to anyone.

10/10

Portal 2, como su antecesor, se basa en superar puzles para ir avanzando en la historia. Lo que mas me gusto personalmente de este juego es que se puedan crear mapas para la comunidad, sobre todo el coop ;D
nice

Este juego aunque simple es en mi opinion muy bueno por su inteligencia, y no me refiero a los puzles. Los dialogos y la historia son geniales y si prestas atencion puedes apreciar la gracia y 'genialidad' que tienen, yo me rei bastante jugando.

En cuanto a jugabilidad, es simple como ya he mencionado, aun asi tiene la profundidad suficiente como para incorporar nuevas mecanicas para los puzles durante la mayor parte de la historia principal. Si lo que te preocupa es si no sera demasiado dificil pues no lo es, se que hay gente a los que les cuesta percatarse de como completar desafios een algunos casos pero mi experiencia personal fue muy fluida; apenas me quede atascado durante todo el juego(aun asi si eres un poco lentito te puede costar algo).

No requiere mucha potencia para correr el juego en fps decentes y como carece de accion intensa(casi siempre) pues con que tu te sientas comodo es suficiente.De todas formas hay gran diferencia entre la principal opcion grafica(matizador) en alto o muy alto que en medio o bajo, asique a ser posible recomiendo por lo menos alto.

En definitiva por el precio merece la pena si te gustan algunas de las caracteristicas principales del juego, principalmente los dialogos son el punto fuerte en mi opinion. Ademas el modo cooperativo te permitira jugar varias horas mas con un amigo(requiere otra copia del juego), y es tambien bueno aunque ya mas centrado en la jugabilidad que la historia de este.
me parece que es unjuego muy entretenido tanto singleplayer como multijugador, si lo que buscas es pasar un buen rato mientras piensas este es tu juego
Um jogo recheado de puzzles inteligentes e criativos, amei!!

The first one was magnificent! The second one is amazing! 
A FPS with good action, many puzzles and a perfect story with a cliffhanger end.
Also you should try the first one first :) Co-op is awesome!

if you play it from the first game you can understand a lot.
more features in Portal 2 like laser beam, gravity thingy, and "GOO THINGY" with different colors (you will be giggling yourself because they look like cum).
es muy divertido jugarlo con alguien

Yes. I do recommend this game Steam. Everyone does, the amount of sickness that is in this game is 100%. You should deffinetly buy it and i suggest you play the singleplayer. My thoughts are that this is good for your brain, its a conusing, fun, and funny puzzle game, (like, really funny.) You might see a guy with a valve on his head but don't excpect any scary stuff in this game. Lol.
I'd rate this game a solid 90% because its kinda confusing sometimes and maybe annoying, but its way better than the first one, trust me. It might be 15 dollars, but you can still get it if its on sale, Anyways, you get a portal gun which creates blue and orange portals, everyone might know that except beginers that haven't played Portal 2 or 1 Yet. Try the Co-Op mode and go crazy with your friends testing with ATLAS and P-BODY. Those are the 2 main Co-Op characters and they both get different portal guns, the portal of P-Body is Yellow-ish and red i believe, and Atlas has Blue and Cyan portals.

Anyways, this game is amazing. Absolutely love it, my favorite character is Wheatley and GLaDOS and the turrets because they're so cute. I hope you guys agree with this review and it was really 'thanks and have fun'-ish. So yeah. You can go play TF2 or CS:GO OR ANYTHING THOSE GAMES ARE SH- no jk i really like TF2 and CS:GO :l

Was looking for a fun local co-op game to play with my little sister, we've had hours of fun playing together. Theres a range of easy-harder level puzzles, some which we solved quickly, to one which took us quite a long time. Overall it's a very fun game, especially playing with someone else and recommended to everyone who loves solving puzzles.

흠,. 포탈1은 포탈2의 튜토리얼 수준이라고 말해도 과언은 아닐 정도겠죠
포탈1이 경로만 외우면 30분안으로 깨지만 포탈2는 2시간도 안에 들어가긴 좀 힘들정도죠
게다가 포탈2는 엄청나게 난이도가 오르고 길이도 길어지고 스토리도 재밌어졌죠

传送门2好评如潮的游戏，作者我佩服你的脑洞，刚买回来的时候我感觉没意思，然而当我静下心来玩的时候，我发现这款游戏值得你去买，你解除每个关卡之后总会有成就感和欣慰，原来是这样啊，有趣有趣，然后你就会一直想去解答更多，然而我比较笨，没玩多长时间，不过这个的确很好玩，建议爱脑洞风暴的同学试试。  我给: 8/10。

Without a doubt the absolute best game ever publsihed by Valve. The puzzles are similar to the previous game and then some, but aren't much of a challenge,nonetheless fun. What really drives this game is the narrtion and characters; you just want to progress further into the game to just see what they have to say. This game is significantly longer than the initial installment and every hour of it is pure joy.

Half-Life serisinden sonra Valve'ın piyasaya sürdüğü bu puzzle dolu oyun, kendi benzeri olmayan hikayesi içinde beyninizi zorlayabilecek bulmacalar çevresinde gelişiyor. Tabi zeki değilseniz... :D Ki atölyesi olması da kat kat iyi çünkü belirli bir hikayesi olmasa bile yeni haritalar için uğraş verenler var ve onlara teşekkür etmek istiyorum. Bazıları kolay da olsa aralarında gerçekten zorları da var emin olun. Eğer puzzle oyunları size göreyse ve ayrıca cooperative oynanma şeklinin oyunlara güzellik getirdiğini düşünüyorsanız bu oyun tam size göre....

After Half-Life series there is so many puzzles in Valve's launched game, it is progressing about that can enforce your brain in a unique story. But if you're not smart... :D Which it is much better to it has a workshop, cause even if there is no story, some people trying to create new puzzle maps for "You" and "Portal Lovers"... And i want to thank them. Be sure there is many hard puzzles, beside the easy ones. :D If the puzzles game you like and also you think the cooperative games are brought more beauty in the games, This game up to you... :D

Nigdy nie wiedziałem co ludzie widzieli w Portalu. Stwierdziłem "j**ać, zimowa przecena, kupię obie." Powiem wam, nie grałem w gre z lepszą fabułą. Gra trzyma idealny balans pomiędzy komedią a powagą, zakończenie 2 jest po prostu idealne. Portal 1 i 2 to po prostu kwintesencja idealnej gry. Pokazują, że żeby gra była świetna nie trzeba grafiki z kosmosu, milionów postaci czy otwartego świata o powierzchni pierdyliardów kilometrów kwadratowych. Ta gra, oraz jedynka otrzymuja ode mnie 11/10, ze znaczkiem jakości. :)

You know there are puzzle games that needs you to think outside of the box in order to solve the puzzle?
Portal 2 has more than that.
Because you need to bring the box with you.

I consider this better than the original. It corrects all the faults in Portal (namely brevity). Though I should really say "fault", singular, because that's the only one. Anywho, the storyline is richer, the dialogue is just as funny, and the ending is fantastic (I peed a little). But for those who have no care for art, and only want puzzles, there is the co-op campaign. Oh, so many puzzles, all you need is a friend (I know those can be hard to come by).

This is, without a doubt, the best, and most enjoyable game I have ever played. I have never experienced a game that has made me think, laugh, or lose myself in imersion as much as this game has, and I can't fault the intricate detail of the lore and the captivating, mysterious setting that makes you want to delve deeper into the Aperture Science Laboratories. It's going to take something truely special to outdo this simply amazing game. Highly recommended.

特别喜欢GLaDOS的配音 感觉萌萌的 画面很漂亮  可玩性很强  总之强烈推荐！

Игра замечательная, заставляет двигать мозгой, в отличии от первой части, она стала более живой, более приветливой, с кучей юмора и постоянных подколов со стороны роботов, все это оставляет хорошие впечатления, и после прохождения даже становится грустно, что все закончилось(
